1b1('bum): @shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun
1b2('bum): cu don drug pa/ / / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams med pa'i
1b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sa'i khams stong pa
2a1('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sa'i khams dben
2a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
2a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
2a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
2b1('bum): so/ sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
2b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
2b3('bum): so/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir bang
2b4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
2b5('bum): dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams med pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa
3a1('bum): nyid dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
3a2('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i
3a3('bum): khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin//
3a4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
3a5('bum): de ltar na sa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i
3a6('bum): khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
3b1('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
3b2('bum): dmigs so/ / chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
3b3('bum): chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa
3b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
3b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
3b6('bum): dmigs so/ / chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de tsa
3b7('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams med pa dang / tshu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo ba nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
4a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chu'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams dben pa yang
4a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
4a3('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chu'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i kham
4a4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang
4a5('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir
4a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / me'i khabs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
4a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig
4b1('bum): so/ / me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i
4b2('bum): khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sem
4b3('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu me'i khams med pa dang /
4b4('bum): me'i khams stong pa nyid dang / me'i khams dben pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ me'i
4b5('bum): khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
4b6('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar
4b7('bum): na me'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / me'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
5a1('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med/
5a2('bum): do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
5a3('bum): rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams
5a4('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byung
5a5('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
5a6('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
5a7('bum): so/ / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams med pa dang / rlung gi khams
5b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rlung gi khams med//
5b2('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
5b3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rlung gi khams med pa gang yin/
5b4('bum): pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
5b5('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams
5b6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i
5b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams med pa'i
6a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i
6a2('bum): khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams
6a3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mo dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir
6a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
6a5('bum): nam mkha'i khams med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
6a6('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nam mkha'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma
6a7('bum): yin/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
6b1('bum): / dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nam mkha'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams
6b2('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
6b3('bum): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
6b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
6b5('bum): so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
6b6('bum): mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
6b7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
7a1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byung
7a2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
7a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' ma
7a4('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam
7a5('bum): par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
7a6('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes
7a7('bum): pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
7b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i/
7b2('bum): bum rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang
7b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
7b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma
7b5('bum): rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
7b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
7b7('bum): dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa med pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi
8a1('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ ma rig pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma
8a2('bum): yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
8a3('bum): yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ma rig pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
8a4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su
8a5('bum): byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
8a6('bum): mi dmigs so/ / 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
8a7('bum): 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir
8b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
8b2('bum): su mi dmigs so/ / 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed do/
8b3('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed med pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa
8b4('bum): dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'du byed med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
8b5('bum): yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
8b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin
8b7('bum): pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams
9a1('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sem dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam
9a2('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo/
9a3('bum): papo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi
9a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
9a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
9a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
9a7('bum): dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngos
9b1('bum): nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// /
9b2('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
9b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa
9b4('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
9b5('bum): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
9b6('bum): ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang
9b7('bum): gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs
10a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs/
10a2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi
10a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi migs so/ / ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
10a4('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ming dang gzugs med pa dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / ming dang gzugs dben pa dang / ming
10a5('bum): dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ ming dang gzugs med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ming dang gzugs
10a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ming dang gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
10a7('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ming dang gzugs med pa gang yin pa dang //
10b1('bum): ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
10b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched
10b3('bum): drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i
10b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang
10b5('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems/
10b6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
10b7('bum): dmigs so/ / skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye mched
11a1('bum): drug ngo ma nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug med pa dang / skye mched drug/
11a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug dben pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ skye mched drug med pa
11a3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
11a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na skye mched drug med pa gang yin
11a5('bum): pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
11a6('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa med pa'i
11a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
11b1('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg
11b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
11b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
11b4('bum): reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
11b5('bum): ti'i bu/ reg pa med pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / reg pa dben pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmis
11b6('bum): te/ reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
11b7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na reg pa med pa gang yin pa
12a1('bum): dang / reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
12a2('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba med pa'i
12a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
12a4('bum): mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tsher ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa
12a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / tshe rab dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
12a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dpogs so// tshor
12a7('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
12b1('bum): tshor ba med pa dang / tsher rab stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / tsher ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshor ba med pa
12b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
12b3('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid
12b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
12b5('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso/
12b6('bum): sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
12b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mo dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
13a1('bum): mi dmigs so/ / sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
13a2('bum): sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
13a3('bum): mi dmigs so/ / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa med pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid dang
13a4('bum): srid pa dben pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs te/ sred pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa stong pa nyid kyang
13a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sred pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
13a6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sred pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sred pa dben pa gang yin pa
13a7('bum): dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang
13b1('bum): nyisas ga sasu byung meda'o/ / smra na ba hru du/ na pa da du byung chub sas byu d+mo kyi spur ba migs so// len pa spyod pa dug b+h+ru~M byung chub sems dpa
13b2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa med pa'i phyir
13b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
13b4('bum): so/ / rtalen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
13b5('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir
13b6('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ len pa med pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid dang / len pa dben pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
13b7('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ len pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ len pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan
14a1('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
14a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na len pa med pa gang yin pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / len pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
14a3('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
14a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa
14a5('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
14a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
14a7('bum): srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sem
14b1('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir//
14b2('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa med pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang / srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
14b3('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ srid pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma
14b4('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
14b5('bum): de ltar na srid pa med pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
14b6('bum): dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
14b7('bum): skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
15a1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
15a2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med
15a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
15a4('bum): dmigs so/ / skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang /
15a5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba med pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi
15a6('bum): dmigs te/ skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
15a7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na skye ba med pa gang
15b1('bum): yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang
15b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
15b3('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid
15b4('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
15b5('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi
15b6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
15b7('bum): dmigs so/ / rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi med pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang //
16a1('bum): rga shing dben pa dang / rga shing bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rga shi med pa yang gzhan ma yin/
16a2('bum): rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
16a3('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rga shi med pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
16a4('bum): rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
16a5('bum): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
16a6('bum): so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
16a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
16b1('bum): mi dmigs so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
16b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
16b3('bum): dmigs so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
16b4('bum): dmigs so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
16b5('bum): pa med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i/
16b6('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
16b7('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
17a1('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i
17a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
17a3('bum): dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
17a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
17a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
17a6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi
17a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha
17b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa de bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshul
17b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
17b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
17b4('bum): med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo 'ad med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
17b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// tshul
17b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
17b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang /
18a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
18a2('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// /
18a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
18a4('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
18a5('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
18a6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
18a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
18b1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de// med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
18b2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
18b3('bum): pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang
18b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan
18b5('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti
18b6('bum): bude ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod
18b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa
19a1('bum): de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
19a2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
19a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
19a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i
19a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus
19a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
19a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
19b1('bum): mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
19b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyis
19b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus
19b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
19b5('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson
19b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
19b7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir
20a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phy-ir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// bas
20a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
20a3('bum): dmigs so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
20a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid
20a5('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi
20a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam
20a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
20b1('bum): med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
20b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam
20b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
20b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa
20b5('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
20b6('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su
20b7('bum): byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
21a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
21a2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
21a3('bum): phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi
21a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// shes
21a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// /
21a6('bum): shrI rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /
21a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha
21b1('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin// /
21b2('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan pa yin/ shre rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
21b3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
21b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
21b5('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// /
21b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po don bdun pa// / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
21b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
22a1('bum): mi dmigs so/ / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
22a2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
22a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nang stong pa
22a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i
22a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid
22a6('bum): dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nang stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang
22a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin//
22b1('bum): / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong //
22b2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
22b3('bum): pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang
22b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
22b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
22b6('bum): mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
22b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa
23a1('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i
23a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / da ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang /
23a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa
23a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
23a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang
23a6('bum): yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
23a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
23b1('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
23b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// /
23b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa
23b4('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa
23b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
23b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
23b7('bum): dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// /
24a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
24a2('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid
24a3('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
24a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
24a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong
24a6('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong
24a7('bum): pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid spong
24b1('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid spong ba
24b2('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i
24b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
24b4('bum): ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
24b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben
24b6('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
24b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
25a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
25a2('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir
25a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
25a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
25a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// /
25a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong
25a7('bum): panyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
25b1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong ba /
25b2('bum): dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po
25b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhon ma yin//
25b4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang
25b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
25b6('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa/
25b7('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa
26a1('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / don dam pa spong ba nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma dmigs/
26a2('bum): so// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
26a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
26a4('bum): don dam pa spong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa
26a5('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ni'i phyir zhe na/
26a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/
26a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
26b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
26b2('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa
26b3('bum): nyid stong ba nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
26b4('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus
26b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus
26b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus
26b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
27a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar//
27a2('bum): mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
27a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i
27a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo
27a5('bum): nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa
27a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
27a7('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa
27b1('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'// /
27b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
27b3('bum): ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
27b4('bum): so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
27b5('bum): dmigs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
27b6('bum): mi dmigs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
27b7('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
28a1('bum): su mi dmigs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
28a2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
28a3('bum): dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan
28a4('bum): ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
28a5('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus
28a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa
28a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
28b1('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
28b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las
28b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
28b4('bum): so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
28b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir
28b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
28b7('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i
29a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
29a2('bum): pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
29a3('bum): pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
29a4('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// /
29a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' lnga 'das pa stong pa nyid dben
29a6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
29a7('bum): pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
29b1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
29b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
29b3('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang
29b4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
29b5('bum): so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
29b6('bum): dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
29b7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
30a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
30a2('bum): mi dmigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan
30a3('bum): ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
30a4('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang
30a5('bum): yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang //
30a6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
30a7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
30b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
30b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
30b3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
